title: samayamidhE nanu brOva
sahitya:
samayamidE nannu brOva jAlamEla tALajAla



anupallavi



kamala nAbha shrI ramaNa kamalAsananuta caritA



caraNam



karuNatOnu gajarAjuni gAsi rakSincinadi gAka vara pArthasArathi anucu

vasudhalO birudAngituDai

parama bhakta kOTlakella varamulicci brOcina shrI varada venkaTEsha nAthuDu

ritamella dIrcavayya
